data.name: Double Kick Heroes - Original Sound Track
data.detailed_description:
Original Sound Track of the one and only Rhythm METAL'EM UP.

01 Run For Your Lives
02 Double Kick Heroes
03 The Running Dead
04 The Road To Hell
05 Planet Error
06 Road Freak
07 Crush
08 Sawing Your Head Off (feat. PJ666)
09 We're Gonna Rock Your Socks Off
10 Destroy And Race And Groove
11 Rust In The Wind
12 Die Untoten (feat. Olli Samsara)
13 Condemned To Slaughter
14 I'm Marching Now (feat. Matt Dumas)
15 Warriors Of The Badlands (feat. Ludo Farail)
16 Surprise You're Undead
17 Thrasher's Delight
18 Harmonic Mayhem
19 Undead And Kicking
20 The Evil Zombies Do (feat. Franck Larigaudie, Fanalo & Mathieu Pascal)
21 Don't Bite My Butt (feat. Sab Elvenia)
22 We Are The Devs
23 Tease Me Macaroni
24 I'm Marching Now (instrumental)
25 The Evil Zombies Do (instrumental)
26 Don't Bite My Butt (instrumental)
27 We Are The Devs (instrumental)
28 Die Untoten (instrumental)
